attributes.action: Call by-elections concerning election cheating in May 2015 & in 2014
attributes.additional_details: There is a need to clean up the Election process and the actual rules are broken by secretly paid mobs such as the organization call Hope not Peace. The decent folk the ordinary British citizens are totally fed up and disgusted at dirty politics
attributes.background:
The Electoral Commission has fined the Conservative Party £70,000 over "significant" election campaign expenses issues.

The independent elections watchdog said the party had made "numerous failures" in reporting its expenses for the 2015 General Election and three by-elections in 2014.

rejection.details: This isn't something that the UK Government or Parliament has the power to do.
